name: Physiotherapy Quiz
description: Physiotherapy Quiz App  An innovative app from Sana Edutech focusing on educating students preparing for Physiotherapy exams - could be for Competitive admission, enrollment in B.P.T or M.P.T like courses. Even medical students practicing MBBS can go through the contents and practice quiz to get an idea of Physiotherapy.  All essential study subjects related to Physiotherapy has got covered in this app - Biomechanics - Electrotherapy - Exercise Therapy - Physiology - Orthopedics - PTM & PTS - Research  Features in this app include :  - Fast UI, Best in class user-interface presented in Android app Quiz format - App designed to work for all screens - Phones & Tablets - Review your answers against right answers - Learn fast - Detail reports on your performance of all quiz attended - No limits on quiz, retry any number of times
